title: Ngalum - New Testament (Book)
description: Ngalum is the most populous of the Ok languages of Western New Guinea and Papua New Guinea.

language.name: Ngalum
language.area: Northeast of Nakai, valleys of Ok Sibil, Ok Tsop, perhaps Ok Bon, main range border area north of Muyu [kts] (Yongkom) and Iwur [iwo]. Also in Papua New Guinea.
